sentence.Network_en: The anti - illiteracy education is necessary not only for society progess, but also for individual person.
sentence.Network_cn: 扫盲教育是社会进步的需要, 也是生命个体赖以发展的需要.

sentence.Network_en: We make progess if, and only if, we are prepared to lear from our mistakes.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有当你准备好从错误中学习的时候, 你才会有进步.

sentence.Network_en: Most historians , including those of sciences, agree that science constitutes an important embodiment of human progess.
sentence.Network_cn: 史学家包括科学史学家大多同意,科学是人类进步的重要体现者.
